title: Facebook Marketing
tagline: Learn how to create, edit and manage a facebook page, learn about facebook ads and boosting methods, reach your targeted customers and grow your business.
shortDescription: Facebook is an online-place where most of the people spend their free time in. It's a big opportunity for the business owners to reach their customer easily. But you should know how to do that, how to reach the customer and deal with them and also how to use the facebook efficiently. This course will teach you these certain things.
learningList: How to make your business a brand
How to manage your page to gain organic customers

mentors.name: Khaled Mohiuddin
mentors.qualification: Marketing Officer and CEO of GloballyORG

mentors.name: Ahmed Jamshed
mentors.qualification: Sales manager and Marketing director at SheffBejo
